paper_keywords: Testing and Test Control Notation version 3 (TTCN-3)
paper_abstract: This paper describes a conformance test tool for push-to-talk over cellular network developed on an Open Mobile Alliance Service Interoperability Test Platform. Based on the TTCN-3 specifications, we show how PoC test cases can be efficiently implemented on the test platform. Copyright (C) 2007 John Wiley & Sons, Ltd.
paper_title: NTP-PoCT: A conformance test tool for push-to-talk over cellular network
